name: 2025 BYD Song Plus
description: The BYD Song Plus is a versatile SUV designed for both family and commercial use. It comes with a 450 hp motor, offering a maximum range of 520 km and a spacious interior for up to 5 passengers. With advanced safety features and a sleek design, the Song Plus is perfect for various needs.

name: 2025 Farizon V6E
description: Farizon V6E is an electric light truck designed for urban logistics. It offers a spacious cargo area, a range of up to 305 km, and advanced safety features. Ideal for businesses looking for efficient and eco-friendly transportation solutions.

name: 2025 Toyota Bz3
description: The TOYOTA BZ3 is a stylish and modern electric vehicle designed for urban driving. It comes with a 300 hp motor, offering a maximum range of 517 km and a sophisticated interior for up to 5 passengers. With advanced safety features and a sleek design, the BZ3 is perfect for urban environments and eco-conscious drivers.

name: 2025 ID.4 Crozz
description: The ID.4 CROZZ Pure Enjoyment Edition is an urban-friendly electric SUV that combines style, comfort, and efficiency. It features a 204hp electric motor, a range of up to 442km, and a spacious interior for up to 5 passengers. With its advanced safety features and modern design, it is the perfect choice for eco-conscious drivers who value both practicality and sustainability.

name: 2025 Leapmotor C16
description: The LEAPMOTOR C16 is a premium SUV designed for comfort and long-distance travel. It offers an impressive range of 910 km, spacious seating for up to 6 passengers, and a luxurious interior. With advanced safety features and a sleek design, the C16 is perfect for families and those seeking a premium driving experience.

name: 2025 KIA Ev5
description: The KIA EV5 is a compact SUV designed for urban driving. It offers a range of 530 km, seating for up to 5 passengers, and a basic configuration. With its efficient electric motor and modern design, the EV5 is perfect for city commuters looking for a reliable and eco-friendly vehicle.

name: 2025 BYD Seagull
description: The BYD SEAGULL is a compact SUV designed for urban driving. It offers a range of 300 km, seating for up to 5 passengers, and a basic configuration. With its efficient electric motor and modern design, the SEAGULL is perfect for city commuters looking for a reliable and eco-friendly vehicle.

name: 2025 BYD Yuan Plus
description: The BYD YUAN PLUS is a compact SUV designed for urban driving. It offers a range of 510 km, seating for up to 5 passengers, and a basic configuration. With its efficient electric motor and modern design, the YUAN PLUS is perfect for city commuters looking for a reliable and eco-friendly vehicle.

name: 2025 Toyota Frontlander
description: The Toyota Corolla Cross Frontlander is a versatile SUV designed for both urban and off-road driving. It offers a range of 400 km, seating for up to 5 passengers, and a premium configuration. With its powerful engine and advanced safety features, the Corolla Cross Frontlander is perfect for families and adventurers alike.

name: 2025 BYD TANG L
description: The BYD TANG L is a premium large SUV designed for families and long-distance travel. It offers an impressive range of 600 km, spacious seating for up to 7 passengers, and a luxurious interior. With advanced safety features and powerful performance, the TANG L is perfect for those seeking comfort and capability.

name: 2025 FARIZON V7E
description: The FARIZON V7E is a versatile electric van designed for commercial and family use. It offers a range of 350 km, spacious seating for up to 7 passengers, and excellent cargo capacity. Ideal for businesses and large families seeking an efficient and practical electric vehicle.

name: 2025 GEELY RADAR JINGGANG
description: The GEELY RADAR JINGGANG is a premium electric pickup truck combining rugged capability with advanced technology. It offers an impressive range of 550 km, comfortable seating for 5 passengers, and powerful performance. Perfect for those who need both work capability and modern electric vehicle features.

name: 2025 Toyota Bz3x
description: The TOYOTA BZ3X is a premium electric SUV that combines Toyota's legendary reliability with cutting-edge electric technology. With a range of 580 km, seating for 5 passengers, and advanced safety systems, the BZ3X represents the future of sustainable mobility.

name: 2025 Leapmotor C10
description: The LEAPMOTOR C10 is a smart electric SUV designed for modern drivers. It offers a range of 530 km, comfortable seating for 5 passengers, and innovative technology features. With its sleek design and competitive pricing, the C10 is an excellent choice for tech-savvy buyers.

name: 2025 ICAR 03
description: The ICAR 03 is a youthful and stylish electric SUV designed for urban adventurers. It offers a range of 400 km, seating for 5 passengers, and vibrant color options. With its affordable price and fun-to-drive character, the ICAR 03 is perfect for young professionals and families.

name: 2025 ICAR V23
description: The ICAR V23 is a practical electric van designed for both commercial and family use. It offers a range of 380 km, spacious seating for 6 passengers, and versatile cargo configurations. Perfect for small businesses and growing families who need space and efficiency.

name: 2025 Jetour Shanhai T2
description: The JETOUR SHANHAI T2 is a rugged electric pickup truck designed for both work and adventure. It offers a range of 420 km, seating for 5 passengers, and impressive towing capacity. With its durable construction and off-road capability, the SHANHAI T2 is perfect for those who demand versatility.
